mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ks_board_notice WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY REG_DTTM DESC limit #{length} offset #{start}
SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM ks_board_notice WHERE USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT N.BOARD_NO , 'N' AS BOARD_TYPE , N.TITLE , N.CONTENT , N.RANK , N.HIT , N.REG_ID , N.REG_DTTM , FILE_NO , FILE_SEQ , FILE_NM , FILE_DIR FROM KS_BOARD_NOTICE N LEFT JOIN KS_FILE F ON N.BOARD_NO = F.BOARD_NO AND F.BOARD_TYPE = 'N' AND F.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE N.USE_YN = 'Y' AND N.BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}

SELECT BOARD_NO AS prevNoticeNo , TITLE AS prevNoticeTitle FROM ks_board_notice WHERE BOARD_NO = ( SELECT BOARD_NO FROM KS_BOARD_NOTICE WHERE BOARD_NO < #{boardNo} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC LIMIT 1 )

SELECT BOARD_NO AS nextNoticeNo , TITLE AS nextNoticeTitle FROM ks_board_notice WHERE BOARD_NO = ( SELECT BOARD_NO FROM KS_BOARD_NOTICE WHERE BOARD_NO > #{boardNo} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC LIMIT 1 )
mapper.update: UPDATE ks_board_notice SET HIT = IFNULL(HIT, 0) + 1 WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND USE_YN = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM ks_board_forum WHERE BOARD_TYPE = #{boardType} AND USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT B.BOARD_NO , B.BOARD_TYPE , B.TITLE , B.CONTENT , B.HIT , B.REG_ID , B.REG_DTTM , FILE_NO , FILE_SEQ , FILE_NM , FILE_DIR FROM ks_board_forum B LEFT JOIN KS_FILE F ON B.BOARD_NO = F.BOARD_NO AND B.BOARD_TYPE = F.BOARD_TYPE AND F.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND B.BOARD_TYPE = #{boardType}

SELECT BOARD_NO AS prevNo , TITLE AS prevTitle FROM ks_board_forum WHERE BOARD_NO = ( SELECT BOARD_NO FROM ks_board_forum WHERE BOARD_NO < #{boardNo} AND BOARD_TYPE = #{boardType} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC LIMIT 1 )

SELECT BOARD_NO AS nextNo , TITLE AS nextTitle FROM ks_board_forum WHERE BOARD_NO = ( SELECT BOARD_NO FROM ks_board_forum WHERE BOARD_NO > #{boardNo} AND BOARD_TYPE = #{boardType} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC LIMIT 1 )
